entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
